text: 2:19 Dɨboboniba 16:5; 16:26; Aisaia 52:11; Nahum 1:7; Jon 10:14; 10:27; Rom 8:35; 1 Korin 8:3; 1 Jon 2:19Ezɨ God mati gumazim dɨpenimɨn ingari moghɨn, a uan siosɨn ingarasa dɨpenir akɨnir gavgaviba akunizɨ da tugha ikia gavgafi. Egha dɨpenir akɨnir kabar a kamaghɨn osiri, “Ekiam bar uan gumazamizibagh fo.” Egha ua kamaghɨn osiri, “Gumazamizir Ekiamɨn ziam itiba, me akɨrim ragh bar arazir kurabagh asaragh.”
